brand.name: Doran Homes
brand.tagline: Your trusted partner for luxury real estate in Ibiza since 2011.

hero.imageAlt: Indoor-outdoor dining area overlooking scenic landscape

service1.title: Buying, Selling & Renting Homes
service1.description: We offer a wide range of houses and apartments for both vacation and long-term rental or purchase.

service2.title: Legal & Construction Consulting
service2.description: Our network boasts the best professionals to address any need related to property acquisition, refurbishment, and sale.

service3.imageAlt: Living room interior with modern design
service3.title: Refurbishment & Interior Design
service3.description: We are passionate about interior design and have been advising our clients on how to make the most out of their properties.

about.heading: Hi, I'm Micaela
about.paragraph1: Trained in interior design and licensed as a real-estate agent since 2011, I work where those two worlds meet—helping people in Ibiza choose well, design carefully, and settle in with confidence.
about.paragraph2: I start with listening. We look at how you live—light, flow, storage, rhythm—and shape the search around that. With a small, trusted team, I keep relationships close and the process calm, so decisions feel clear and considered.
about.paragraph3: We handle the details end to end: property search and negotiation, legal coordination and licensing, refurbishment and interior design advice. The aim is simple—fewer, better choices, and a home that feels like you.
about.imageAlt: A woman with long, wavy hair sits at a dining table in a restaurant, adjusting her hair. The table has a white tablecloth, a glass of water, and a folded napkin. In the background, art and elegant curtains are visible.

hero.heading: Let's Connect
hero.description: Contact us today, and let us guide you in finding your perfect Ibiza home—whether it's a ground floor luxury apartment, or an exclusive penthouse retreat.

message.label: Message
message.placeholder: Tell us about your dream property in Ibiza...

ContactPage.imageAlt: Aerial view of modern residential complex

hero.heading: Take A Look Inside
hero.description: Explore our meticulously designed spaces where modern luxury meets Mediterranean charm

amenities.heading: Amenities
amenities.description: All our apartments include 3-4 bedrooms, a private pool & garden, spa & fitting rooms, gym, indoor parking, and panoramic views of Dalt Villa and the Mediterranean Sea.
amenities.closing: At Doran Homes, we're dedicated to the Ibiza lifestyle. With a wide range of properties and central apartments, we customize your stay for an exceptional experience. Offering turn-key projects, we handle licensing, legal, and interior design, so you can simply enjoy.

location.heading: Prime Location
location.description: Only three minutes walking from the wonderful Talamanca beach and the vibrant city of Ibiza. The White Angel is located in the heart of the city, with easy access to everything Ibiza has to offer.

groundFloor.heading: GROUND FLOOR
groundFloor.imageAlt: Architectural floor plan of a house showing various rooms, furniture, and outdoor areas.

penthouse.heading: PENTHOUSE
penthouse.imageAlt: Architectural floor plan of a house showing rooms, furniture, kitchen, bedrooms, bathrooms, and outdoor patio with a swimming pool.

introduction.heading: Introduction
introduction.paragraph1: At Doran Homes, we are committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information in accordance with the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and Spanish data protection laws.
introduction.paragraph2: We only collect information that is necessary to provide you with our services and communicate with you effectively about luxury properties in Ibiza.

dataCollection.heading: Data We Collect
dataCollection.intro: We collect the following types of information:

personalData.heading: Personal Data
personalData.description: Name, email address, phone number, and any other information you provide when contacting us through our website or other channels.

technicalData.heading: Technical Data
technicalData.description: IP address, browser type, device information, and cookies (see our Cookie Policy for details).

communicationData.heading: Communication Data
communicationData.description: Content of messages you send us and records of our interactions with you.

dataUse.heading: How We Use Your Data
dataUse.purpose1: To respond to your inquiries about properties and services
dataUse.purpose2: To provide you with information about properties that match your requirements
dataUse.purpose3: To maintain and improve our website and services
dataUse.purpose4: To comply with legal and regulatory obligations
dataUse.purpose5: To send you relevant property updates, with your consent

legalBasis.heading: Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.intro: We process your personal data based on:

consent.heading: Your Consent
consent.description: When you provide information through contact forms or subscribe to communications

contract.heading: Contract Performance
contract.description: When processing is necessary to fulfill our services

legitimate.heading: Legitimate Interests
legitimate.description: To improve our services and provide you with relevant property information

yourRights.heading: Your Rights
yourRights.intro: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:

access.heading: Right of Access
access.description: Request a copy of the personal data we hold about you

rectification.heading: Right to Rectification
rectification.description: Request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data

erasure.heading: Right to Erasure
erasure.description: Request deletion of your personal data ('right to be forgotten')

restriction.heading: Right to Restriction
restriction.description: Request limitation of processing of your data

portability.heading: Right to Data Portability
portability.description: Receive your data in a structured, commonly used format

objection.heading: Right to Object
objection.description: Object to processing of your data for direct marketing or legitimate interests

dataRetention.heading: Data Retention
dataRetention.description: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, comply with legal obligations, or resolve disputes. Marketing data is retained until you withdraw consent.

dataSecurity.heading: Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. However, no internet transmission is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

contact.heading: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact us at:

introduction.heading: Introduction
introduction.paragraph1: This Cookie Policy explains how Doran Homes uses cookies and similar technologies on our website to enhance your browsing experience and provide you with relevant information about luxury properties in Ibiza.
introduction.paragraph2: By using our website, you consent to the use of cookies in accordance with this Cookie Policy.

whatAreCookies.heading: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.description: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently and provide information to website owners.

essential.heading: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly and cannot be disabled.
essential.purposeText: Enable core website functionality, language preferences, and security features

analytics.heading: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting anonymous information.
analytics.purposeText: Analyze website traffic, user behavior, and improve our services

preference.heading: Preference Cookies
preference.description: These cookies remember your preferences and choices to provide a more personalized experience.
preference.purposeText: Remember your language selection and other preferences

managingCookies.heading: Managing Cookies
managingCookies.paragraph1: You can control and manage cookies through your browser settings. Most browsers allow you to refuse or accept cookies, delete existing cookies, or be notified when new cookies are set.
managingCookies.paragraph2: Please note that disabling certain cookies may impact the functionality of our website and your user experience.

thirdParty.heading: Third-Party Cookies
thirdParty.description: We may use third-party services such as analytics tools that may set their own cookies. These third parties have their own privacy and cookie policies, which we encourage you to review.

updates.heading: Updates to This Policy
updates.description: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in technology or legal requirements. The 'Last Updated' date at the top of this page indicates when the policy was last revised.

contact.heading: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at:

CookieConsent.message: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and provide relevant information about properties. By continuing to use our website, you consent to our use of cookies.
